comments.author: Rob
comments.body: WOuld love to dualathlon with Dave, how about Friday instead of Thursday? Also, I'd ride early with you today, but I worry I'd slow you down! What do you say, will you ride with the slow coach?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Friday sounds great to hit the pipe cut w/ Roberto et al.. I'll be chugging away behind you guys, ready to belay anyone who slips and heads south. A warning though: I WILL [cut the rope](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W9Y6MNyWp6s) sooner rather than later.
